# sweet_api_key (Resource)

Api key

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    sweet = {
      source = "sweet-security/sweet"
    }
  }
}

provider "sweet" {
  api_key = "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"
  secret = "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"
}

resource "sweet_api_key" "example" {
  description = "key for sensor installation with only ingestion permissions"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `description` (String) Key Description

### Optional

- `roles` (List of String) Attach Roles

### Read-Only

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) Api Key
- `secret` (String, Sensitive) Api Secret
